definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.chinese: 他是一名北方军的侦察兵。

sentences.english: The scouts infiltrated into the enemy positions.
sentences.chinese: 侦察兵渗透到敌人阵地后面去了。

sentences.english: The scouts can go behind the enemy lines.
Scout troopers use their swift vehicles to rocket back to their bases to call on heavier forces.
sentences.chinese: 侦察兵依靠迅捷的交通工具飞速赶回基地召唤大部队。

sentences.english: The general landed on the scout for his not carefully observing the enemy situation.
sentences.chinese: 将军责骂那个侦察兵没有仔细观察敌情。

sentences.english: The soldier rode out of the ford with the scouts in advance.
sentences.chinese: 侦察兵先涉过浅滩，战士们跟着安然渡过。

sentences.english: Although the scouts to quote, the eighth route army has pulled out of the snake winding.
sentences.chinese: 虽然侦察兵来报，八路军已经撤出了蛇盘山。

sentences.english: I sometimes use the otus when defending, initially, to detect any camoflauged snipers trying to slip through.
sentences.chinese: 最初我会用队长侦察机用于防守，这可以发现侦察兵。

sentences.english: Stormtrooper scout units were usually assigned to garrison posts.
sentences.chinese: 冲锋队侦察兵通常被部署到守备基地中。

sentences.english: Newsboys were known for being loud and intrusive, much like the Scout.
sentences.chinese: 和侦察兵一样，报童常常被视为是吵杂的嗨咖。

sentences.english: The scouts are active under the enemy's very noses.
sentences.chinese: 侦察兵就在敌人眼皮底下活动。

sentences.english: The scouts started off on their mission on a stormy night.
sentences.chinese: 侦察兵们在一个雷雨之夜出发去执行任务。

sentences.english: As our scouts reported, the last crossed the river on rafts in the night.
sentences.chinese: 据侦察兵报告，最后一批法国佬在深夜乘木筏渡河了。

sentences.english: The scout saw the flash of a gun and then heard the zip of a bullet.
sentences.chinese: 侦察兵看见枪口火光一闪，然后听见子弹的尖啸声。

sentences.english: Right now I'm playing Oblivion and Ghost Recon for the PC.
sentences.chinese: 现在我正在玩《遗忘国度》和《灵魂侦察兵》。

sentences.english: The scouts went out during the night.

definition: to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
the situation of the enemy positions/intelligence about the enemy
